tool_description:
Shortened URL Validator API enables you to quickly validate your shortened URLs and be confident that any of your shortened URLs work as expected. 

In case you have specific requirements or would like to have custom API then => https://www.entamatrix.tech
name: Shorten URL Validator
title: Shorten URL Validator

api_list.name: shortenurlvalidator
api_list.description:
Endpoint to validate provided shorten URL. 
Required parameter: URL
Optional parameter: Email address
